data.enText: a person who believes in and follows the teachings of a religious or political leader

data.chText: 经济学家约翰∙梅纳德∙凯恩斯的信徒
data.enText: a disciple of the economist John Maynard Keynes
(according to the Bible) one of the people who followed Jesus Christ and his teachings when he was living on earth, especially one of the twelve Apostles

tr: someone who believes and helps to spread the doctrine of another

value.def: If you are someone's disciple, you are influenced by their teachings and try to follow their example.
value.tran: 信徒;门徒;追随者;崇奉者
